role.title: Role
role.description: Role assigned to this inbox that may be relevant for the consumer.

code.title: Code
code.description: Code or ID that identifies the Inbox.

url.title: URL
url.description:
URL of the inbox that includes the protocol, server, and path. May
be used instead of the Code to identify the inbox.

ext.title: Extensions
ext.description: Extension code map for any additional regime or addon specific codes that may be required.

Inbox.description: Inbox is used to store data about a connection with a service that is responsible for potentially receiving copies of GOBL envelopes or other document formats defined locally.
